mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, USER_ID as user_id, QUESTION as question, CREATED_AT as created_at, UPDATED_AT as updated_at FROM BOT_QUESTIONS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ID as id, USER_ID as user_id, QUESTION as question, CREATED_AT as created_at, UPDATED_AT as updated_at FROM BOT_QUESTIONS WHERE CREATED_AT >= #{from} AND CREATED_AT < #{to} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO BOT_QUESTIONS d USING ( SELECT #{id} AS ID, #{user_id} AS USER_ID, #{question} AS QUESTION, #{created_at} AS CREATED_AT, #{updated_at} AS UPDATED_AT FROM DUAL ) s ON (s.USER_ID = d.USER_ID AND s.QUESTION = d.QUESTION) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ID, USER_ID, QUESTION, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( s.ID, s.USER_ID, s.QUESTION, s.CREATED_AT, s.UPDATED_AT ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET UPDATED_AT = s.UPDATED_AT
